long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you felt your LinkedIn feed getting noisy with posts like these: 
 - "I'm thrilled to announce..." (goes on to self-congratulate themself)
 - A 500 word post of how someone failed an exam in school and now works at Google.
 - People using LinkedIn as Instagram.
You're not alone! 

denoise can do the following for you:
 - 🗂️ Categorize posts by categories YOU define.
 - 📝 Summarize lengthy posts within a few words.
 - 🔍 Adjust summary lengths (spoiler: it can even be 1 word !)
 - 🚫 Abstract away posts marked as "noise".
 - ✨LinkedIn can be demotivating when everyone's an achiever. Motivate yourself on abstracted posts.
